property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that costs 6 or less and destroy it. ■ 'Civil Count 3': When you put this creature, if you don't have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or tamaseeds, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, destroy this creature after the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. ■ You may have more than 4 of this card in your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. {SHIELD SAVER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than that creature from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a Dragon that has Bolshack in its name, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Evolution: Put on one of your fire Dragons. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your creatures gets "power attacker +1000" for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return an evolution creature or linked God to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at your opponent's hand. You may choose one of them and put it into its owner's shield zone face up.
